analyzed: abhibhava anupapattiḥ ca vyañjaka samāna deśasya abhivyaktau prāpti abhāvāt vyañjakena samāna deśe abhivyajyate śabdaḥ iti etasmin pakṣe nā upapadyate

ayaugapadyāt anutpattiḥ yugapad jñānānām ātma guṇa tve

na utpatti kāraṇa an apadeśāt
ātma indriya sannikarṣa mātrāt gandha ādi jñānam utpadyate iti
na atra utpatti kāraṇam apadiśyate yena etat
vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca avasthāne tad nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ
tad ātma guṇa tve api tulyam iti etat anena samuccīyate
dvividhaḥ hi guṇa nāśa hetuḥ
guṇānām āśraya abhāvaḥ virodhī ca guṇaḥ
nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ anupapannaḥ pūrvaḥ

original: virodhī ca buddher guṇo na gṛhyate --- tasmād ātmaguṇatve sati buddher nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ//23//
analyzed: virodhī ca buddheḥ guṇaḥ na gṛhyate tasmāt ātma guṇa tve sati buddheḥ

original: NyS_3,2.24: anityatvagrahād buddher buddhyantarād vināśaḥ śabdavat //
analyzed: anitya tva grahāt buddheḥ buddhi antarāt vināśaḥ śabda vat

original: anityā buddhir iti sarvaśarīriṇāṃ pratyātmavedanīyam etat/
analyzed: anityā buddhiḥ iti sarva śarīriṇām pratyātma vedanīyam etat

original: gṛhyate ca buddhisantānaḥ tatra buddher buddhyantaraṃ virodhī guṇa ity anumīyate yathā śabdasantāne śabdaḥ śabdāntaravirodhīti//24//
analyzed: gṛhyate ca buddhi santānaḥ tatra buddheḥ buddhi antaram virodhī guṇaḥ iti anumīyate yathā śabda santāne śabdaḥ

original: asaṅkhyeyeṣu jñānakāriteṣu saṃskāreṣu smṛtihetuṣv ātmasamaveteṣv ātmamanasoś ca sannikarṣe
analyzed: asaṅkhyeyeṣu jñāna kāriteṣu saṃskāreṣu smṛti hetuṣu ātma samaveteṣu ātma manasoḥ ca sannikarṣe

original: samāne smṛtihetau sati na kāraṇasyāyaugapadyam astīti yugapat smṛtayaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ
analyzed: samāne smṛti hetau sati na kāraṇasya ayaugapadyam asti iti yugapad smṛtayaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ
yadi buddhiḥ ātma guṇaḥ syāt iti
tatra kaścid sannikarṣasya ayaugapadyam upapādayiṣyan āha

original: NyS_3,2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣān manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapadutpattiḥ //
analyzed: jñāna samaveta ātma pradeśa sannikarṣāt manasaḥ smṛti utpatteḥ na yugapad utpattiḥ

original: jñānasādhanaḥ saṃskāro jñānam ity ucyate jñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ paryāyeṇa manaḥ sannikṛṣyate/
analyzed: jñāna sādhanaḥ saṃskāraḥ jñānam iti ucyate jñāna saṃskṛtaiḥ ātma pradeśaiḥ paryāyeṇa manaḥ sannikṛṣyate
ātma manaḥ sannikarṣāt smṛtayaḥ api paryāyeṇa
na antar śarīra vṛtti tvāt manasaḥ

original: sadehasyātmano manasā saṃyogo vipacyamānakarmāśayasahito jīvanam iṣyate/
analyzed: sa dehasya ātmanaḥ manasā saṃyogaḥ vipacyamāna karma āśaya sahitaḥ jīvanam iṣyate

original: tatrāsya prāk prāyaṇād antaḥśarīre vartamānasya manasaḥ śarīrād bahirjñānasaṃskṛtair ātmapradeśaiḥ saṃyogo nopapadyata iti//26//
analyzed: tatra asya prāk prāyaṇāt antar śarīre vartamānasya manasaḥ śarīrāt bahis jñāna saṃskṛtaiḥ ātma pradeśaiḥ saṃyogaḥ na upapadyata
sādhya tvāt ahetuḥ
vipacyamāna karma āśaya mātram jīvanam

original: evaṃ ca sati sādhyam antaḥśarīravṛttitvaṃ manasa iti//27//
analyzed: evam ca sati sādhyam antar śarīra vṛtti tvam manasaḥ
smarataḥ śarīra dhāraṇa upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ

original: susmūrṣayā khalv ayaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kaṃcid arthaṃ smarati,
analyzed: susmūrṣayā khalu ayam manaḥ praṇidadhānaḥ cirāt api kaṃcid artham smarati
smarataḥ ca śarīra dhāraṇam dṛśyate

original: ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajaś ca prayatno dvividhaḥ --- dhārakaḥ prerakaś ca,
analyzed: ātma manaḥ sannikarṣa jaḥ ca prayatnaḥ dvividhaḥ dhārakaḥ prerakaḥ ca

original: niḥsṛte ca śarīrād bahir manāsi dhārakasya prayatnasyābhāvād gurutvāt patanaṃ syāt śarīrasya smarata iti//28//0
analyzed: niḥsṛte ca śarīrāt bahis dhārakasya prayatnasya abhāvāt guru tvāt patanam syāt śarīrasya smarata
na tad āśu gati tvāt manasaḥ

original: āśugati manaḥ tasya bahiḥśarīrātmapradeśena jñānasaṃskṛtena sannikarṣaḥ,
analyzed: āśu gati manaḥ tasya bahis śarīra ātma pradeśena jñāna saṃskṛtena sannikarṣaḥ

original: pratyāgatasya ca prayatnotpādanam ubhayaṃ yujyata iti/
analyzed: pratyāgatasya ca prayatna utpādanam ubhayam yujyate iti

original: utpādya vā dhārakaṃ prayatnaṃ śarīrān niḥsaraṇaṃ manasaḥ,
analyzed: utpādya vā dhārakam prayatnam śarīrāt niḥsaraṇam manasaḥ
atas tatra upapannam dhāraṇam
na smaraṇa kāla aniyamāt
kiñcid kṣipram smaryate kiñcid cireṇa
yadā cireṇa

original: tadā susmūrṣayā manasi dhāryamāṇe cintāprabandhe sati kasyacid arthasya liṅgabhūtasya cintanam ārādhitaṃ smṛtihetur bhavati/
analyzed: tadā susmūrṣayā manasi dhāryamāṇe cintā prabandhe sati kasyacid arthasya liṅga bhūtasya cintanam ārādhitam smṛti hetuḥ bhavati
tatra etat cira niścarite manasi na upapadyate iti

original: śarīrasaṃyogānapekṣaś cātmamanaḥsaṃyogo na smṛtihetuḥ śarīrasya bhogāyatanatvāt/
analyzed: śarīra saṃyoga anapekṣaḥ ca ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ na smṛti hetuḥ śarīrasya bhoga āyatana tvāt

original: upabhogāyatanaṃ puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīraṃ na tato niścaritasya manasa ātmasaṃyogamātraṃ jñānasukhādīnām utpattau kalpate,
analyzed: upabhoga āyatanam puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīram na tatas niścaritasya manasaḥ ātma saṃyoga mātram jñāna sukha ādīnām utpattau kalpate
kṛptau vā śarīra vaiyarthyam
ātma preraṇa yadṛcchā jña tābhiḥ ca na saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ

original: ātmapreraṇena vā manaso bahiḥ śarīrāt saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ syāt,
analyzed: ātma preraṇena vā manasaḥ bahis śarīrāt saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ syāt
yadṛcchayā vā
ākasmika tayā jña tayā vā manasaḥ
sarvathā ca anupapattiḥ
katham smartavya tvāt
icchātaḥ smaraṇāt jñāna asambhavāt ca

original: yadi tāvad ātmā amuṣyārthasya smṛtihetuḥ saṃskāraḥ amuṣminn ātmadeśe samavetas tena manaḥ saṃyujyatām iti manaḥ prerayati tadā smṛta evāsāv  #
analyzed: yadi tāvat ātmā amuṣya arthasya smṛti hetuḥ saṃskāraḥ amuṣmin ātma deśe samavetaḥ tena manaḥ saṃyujyatām iti manaḥ prerayati tadā smṛtaḥ eva asau  /
arthaḥ bhavati na smartavyaḥ
na ca ātma pratyakṣaḥ ātma pradeśaḥ saṃskāraḥ vā
tatra anupapanna ātma pratyakṣeṇa saṃvittiḥ iti

original: susmūrṣayā cāyaṃ manaḥ praṇidadhānaś cirād api kañcid arthaṃ smarati nākasmāt,
analyzed: susmūrṣayā ca ayam manaḥ praṇidadhānaḥ cirāt api kañcid artham smarati na akasmāt

original: jñatvaṃ ca manaso nāsti jñānapratiṣedhād iti//31//
analyzed: jña tvam ca manasaḥ na asti jñāna pratiṣedhāt
etat ca
vyāsakta manasaḥ pāda vyathanena saṃyoga viśeṣeṇa samānam

original: yadā khalv ayaṃ vyāsaktamanāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā kaṇṭakena vā pādavyathanam āpnoti tadā ātmamanaḥ saṃyogaviśeṣa eṣitavyaḥ,
analyzed: yadā khalu ayam vyāsakta manāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā kaṇṭakena vā pāda vyathanam āpnoti tadā ātma manaḥ saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ eṣitavyaḥ
dṛṣṭam hi duḥkham duḥkha vedanam ca iti
tatra ayam samānaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yadṛcchayā tu na viśeṣo nākasmikī kriyā nākasmikaḥ saṃyoga iti/
analyzed: yadṛcchayā tu na viśeṣaḥ na ākasmikī kriyā na ākasmikaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti

original: karmādṛṣṭam upabhogārthaṃ kriyāhetur iti cet samānam/
analyzed: karma adṛṣṭam upabhoga artham kriyā hetuḥ iti ced samānam

original: karmādṛṣṭaṃ puruṣasthaṃ puruṣopabhogārthaṃ manasi kriyāhetuḥ evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ ca sidhyatīty evaṃ cen manyase,
analyzed: karma adṛṣṭam puruṣa stham puruṣa upabhoga artham manasi kriyā hetuḥ evam duḥkham duḥkha saṃvedanam ca sidhyati iti evam ced manyase

original: samānam --- smṛtihetāv api saṃyogaviśeṣo bhavitum arhati/
analyzed: samānam smṛti hetau api saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: tatra yad uktam ``ātmapreraṇayadṛcchājñatābhiś ca na saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ'' ity ayam apratiṣedha iti/
analyzed: tatra yat uktam ātma preraṇa yadṛcchā jña tābhiḥ ca na saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ iti ayam apratiṣedhaḥ iti
pūrvaḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ na antar śarīra vṛtti tvāt manasaḥ

original: kaḥ khalv idānīṃ kāraṇayaugapadyasadbhāve yugapad asmaraṇasya hetur iti?
analyzed: kaḥ khalu idānīm kāraṇa yaugapadya sadbhāve yugapad asmaraṇasya hetuḥ iti
praṇidhāna liṅga ādi jñānānām ayugapad bhāvāt yugapad asmaraṇam

original: yathā khalv ātmamanasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃskāraś ca smṛtihetur evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ liṅgādijñānāni tāni ca na yugapadbhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ yugapad  #
analyzed: yathā khalu ātma manasoḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃskāraḥ ca smṛti hetuḥ evam praṇidhānam liṅga ādi jñānāni tāni ca na yugapad bhavanti tad kṛtā smṛtīnām yugapad
anutpattiḥ iti
pratibhavat tu praṇidhāna ādi anapekṣe smārte yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ

original: yat khalv idaṃ prātibham iva jñānaṃ praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārttam utpadyate kadācit tasya yugapadutpattiprasaṅgo hetvabhāvāt/
analyzed: yat khalu idam prātibham iva jñānam praṇidhāna ādi anapekṣam smārttam utpadyate kadācid tasya yugapad utpatti prasaṅgaḥ hetu abhāvāt
sataḥ smṛti hetoḥ a saṃvedanāt prātibhena samāna abhimānaḥ

original: bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,
analyzed: bahu artha viṣaye vai cintā prabandhe kaścid evā arthaḥ kasyacid smṛti hetuḥ

original: % cintāprabandhe kaścid evārthaḥ kasyacit smṛtihetuḥ,] p.864
analyzed: cintā prabandhe kaścid evā arthaḥ kasyacid smṛti hetuḥ
tasya anucintanāt tasya smṛtiḥ bhavati

original: na cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate evaṃ me smṛtir utpanneti/

original: asaṃvedanāt prātibham iva jñānam idaṃ smārtam iti abhimanyate,
analyzed: asaṃvedanāt prātibham iva jñānam idam smārtam iti abhimanyate

original: na tv asti praṇidhānādyanapekṣaṃ smārtam iti/
analyzed: na tu asti praṇidhāna ādi anapekṣam smārtam iti

original: prātibhe katham iti cet puruṣakarmaviśeṣād upabhogavan niyamaḥ/

analyzed: prātibham idānīm jñānam yugapad kasmāt na utpadyate

original: yathopabhogārthaṃ karma yugapadupabhogaṃ na karoti evaṃ puruṣakarmaviśeṣaḥ pratibhāhetur na yugapad anekaṃ prātibhaṃ jñānam utpādayati/
analyzed: yathā upabhoga artham karma yugapad upabhogam na karoti evam puruṣa karma viśeṣaḥ pratibhā hetuḥ na yugapad anekam prātibham jñānam utpādayati
hetu abhāvāt ayuktam iti ced
na karaṇasya pratyaya paryāye sāmarthyāt

original: ``upabhogavan niyama'' ity asti dṛṣṭānto hetur nāstīti cen manyase?
analyzed: upabhoga vat niyamaḥ iti asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ hetuḥ na asti iti ced manyase
na karaṇasya pratyaya paryāye sāmarthyāt

original: naikasmin jñeye yugapad anekaṃ jñānam utpadyate,
analyzed: na ekasmin jñeye yugapad anekam jñānam utpadyate
na ca an ekasmin

original: tad idaṃ dṛṣṭena pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/
analyzed: tat idam dṛṣṭena pratyaya paryāyeṇa anumeyam karaṇa sāmarthyam ittham bhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇa dharmaṇaḥ deha nānātve pratyaya yaugapadyāt iti

original: % pratyayaparyāyeṇānumeyaṃ karaṇasāmarthyam itthambhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇadharmaṇo dehanānātve pratyayayaugapadyād iti/] p.865
analyzed: pratyaya paryāyeṇa anumeyam karaṇa sāmarthyam ittham bhūtam iti na jñātuḥ vikaraṇa dharmaṇaḥ deha nānātve pratyaya yaugapadyāt iti
ayam ca dvitīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: avasthitaśarīrasya cānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapad anekārthasmaraṇaṃ syāt/
analyzed: avasthita śarīrasya ca aneka jñāna samavāyāt eka pradeśe yugapad aneka artha smaraṇam syāt

original: kvacid deśe 'vasthitaśarīrasya jñātur indriyārthaprabandhena jñānam anekam ekasminn ātmapradeśe samavaiti/
analyzed: kvacid deśe avasthita śarīrasya jñātuḥ indriyārtha prabandhena jñānam anekam ekasmin ātma pradeśe samavaiti

original: tena yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñātapūrvasyānekasya yugapat smaraṇaṃ prasajyate pradeśasaṃyogaparyāyābhāvād iti/
analyzed: tena yadā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadā jñāta pūrvasya anekasya yugapad smaraṇam prasajyate pradeśa saṃyoga paryāya abhāvāt iti
ātma pradeśānām adravya antara tvāt ekārtha samavāyasya aviśeṣe sati smṛti yaugapadya pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ

original: śabdasantāne tu śrotrādhiṣṭhānapratyāsattyā śabdaśravaṇavat saṃskārapratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛtyutpatter na yugapad utpattiprasaṅgaḥ/
analyzed: śabda santāne tu śrotra adhiṣṭhāna pratyāsattyā śabda śravaṇa vat saṃskāra pratyāsattyā manasaḥ smṛti utpatteḥ na yugapad utpatti prasaṅgaḥ

original: pūrva eva tu pratiṣedho nānekajñānasamavāyād ekapradeśe yugapat smṛtiprasaṅga iti//33//
analyzed: pūrvaḥ eva tu pratiṣedhaḥ na aneka jñāna samavāyāt eka pradeśe yugapad smṛti prasaṅga

original: puruṣadharmo jñānam antaḥkaraṇasyecchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhāni dharmā iti kasyacid darśanam,
analyzed: puruṣa dharmaḥ jñānam antaḥkaraṇasya icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkhāni dharmāḥ iti kasyacid darśanam
tat pratiṣidhyate
jñasya icchā dveṣa nimitta tvāt ārambha nivṛttyoḥ

original: ayaṃ khalu jānāti tāvad idaṃ me sukhasādhanam idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam iti jñātvā svasya sukhasādhanam āptum icchati,
analyzed: ayam khalu jānāti tāvat idam me sukha sādhanam idam me duḥkha sādhanam iti jñātvā svasya sukha sādhanam āptum icchati

prāpti icchā prayuktasya asya sukha sādhana avāptaye samīhā viśeṣaḥ ārambhaḥ
jihāsā prayuktasya duḥkha sādhana parivarjanam nivṛttiḥ
evam jñāna icchā prayatna dveṣa sukha duḥkhānām ekena abhisambandhaḥ
eka kartṛka tvam jñāna icchā pravṛttīnām samāna āśraya tvam ca
tasmāt jñasya icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkhāni dharmāḥ na acetanasya iti

original: ārambhanivṛttyoś ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭatvāt paratrānumānaṃ veditavyam iti//34//
analyzed: ārambha nivṛttyoḥ ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭa tvāt paratra anumānam veditavyam
atra bhūtacaitanikaḥ āha
tad liṅga tvāt icchā dveṣayoḥ pārthiva ādyeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ

original: ārambhanivṛttiliṅgāv icchādveṣāv iti yasyārambhanivṛttī tasyecchādveṣau tasya jñānam
analyzed: ārambha nivṛtti liṅgau icchā dveṣau iti yasya ārambha nivṛttī tasya icchā dveṣau tasya jñānam

original: iti prāptaṃ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair
analyzed: iti prāptam pārthiva api a taijasa vāyavīyānām śarīrāṇām ārambha nivṛtti darśanāt icchā dveṣa jñānaiḥ
yogaḥ iti caitanyam
paraśu ādiṣu ārambha nivṛtti darśanāt

original: ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti prāptaṃ paraśvādeḥ karaṇasyārambhanivṛttidarśanāc caitanyam iti/
analyzed: ārambha nivṛtti darśanāt icchā dveṣa jñānaiḥ yogaḥ iti prāptam paraśu ādeḥ karaṇasya ārambha nivṛtti darśanāt caitanyam iti
atha śarīrasya icchā ādibhiḥ yogaḥ
paraśu ādeḥ tu karaṇasya ārambha nivṛttī vyabhicarataḥ

original: na tarhy ayaṃ hetuḥ pārthivāpy ataijasavāyavīyānāṃ śarīrāṇām ārambhanivṛttidarśanād icchādveṣajñānair yoga iti/
analyzed: na tarhi ayam hetuḥ pārthiva api a taijasa vāyavīyānām śarīrāṇām ārambha nivṛtti darśanāt icchā dveṣa jñānaiḥ yogaḥ iti

analyzed: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate sati prayatna ānantarīyaka tve asti eva asya nityena

etan
sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anityasamaḥ

original: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate/
analyzed: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bruvataḥ asti ghaṭena anityena sarva bhāvānām sādharmyam iti sarvasya anitya tvam aniṣṭam sampadyate
saḥ ayam anitya tvena pratyavasthānāt anityasama
asya uttaram
sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt
pratijñā ādi avayava yuktam vākyam pakṣa nivartakam pratipakṣa lakṣaṇam pratiṣedhaḥ
tasya pakṣeṇa pratiṣedhyena sādharmyam pratijñā ādi yogaḥ
tat yadi anitya sādharmyāt anitya tvasya asiddhiḥ
sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedhasya api asiddhiḥ
pratiṣedhyena sādharmyāt

original: NyS_5,1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya ca ubhayathā bhāvāt na aviśeṣaḥ

original: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
analyzed: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvena prajñāyate
sa hetu tvena abhidhīyate
sa ca ubhayathā bhavati
ca ubhayathā bhavati
kenacid samānaḥ
kutaścid viśiṣṭaḥ
sāmānyāt sādharmyam viśeṣāt ca vaidharmyam
evam sādharmya viśeṣaḥ hetuḥ
na aviśeṣeṇa sādharmya mātram vaidharmya mātram vā

original: sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha --- ``sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasam'' iti,
analyzed: sādharmya mātram vaidharmya mātram ca āśritya bhavān āha sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anitya sam iti
etat ayuktam iti

original: aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam//34//
analyzed: a viśeṣa sama pratiṣedhe ca yat uktam tat api

original: NyS_5,1.35: nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
analyzed: nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nityasamaḥ
anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāyate

original: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam?
analyzed: tat anitya tvam kim śabde nityam atha anityam
yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati

original: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti/
analyzed: dharmasya sadā bhāvāt dharmiṇaḥ api sadā bhāvaḥ iti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
atha na sarvadā bhavati
anitya tvasya abhāvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ
evam nitya tvena
asya uttaram

original: NyS_5,1.36: pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
analyzed: pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye anitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ

original: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
analyzed: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anitya tvasya bhāvāt iti ucyamāne anujñātam śabdasya anitya tvam

original: anityatvopapatteś ca ``nānityaḥ śabda'' iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate/
analyzed: anitya tva upapatteḥ ca na anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate
atha na abhyupagamyate

original: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti/
analyzed: nityam anitya tvasya bhāvāt iti hetuḥ na bhavati iti hetu abhāvāt pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ iti
nirodhāt abhāvaḥ śabdasya anitya tvam
tatra paripraśna anupapattiḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ paripraśnaḥ --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
analyzed: yaḥ ayam paripraśnaḥ tat anitya tvam kim śabde sarvadā bhavati atha na iti
ayam anupapannaḥ

original: kasmāt? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam;
analyzed: kasmāt utpannasya yaḥ nirodhāt abhāvaḥ śabdasya tat anitya tvam

original: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti/
analyzed: evam ca sati adhikaraṇa ādheya vibhāgaḥ vyāghātāt na asti iti
nitya anitya tva virodhāt ca

original: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete,
analyzed: nitya tvam anitya tvam ca ekasya dharmiṇaḥ dharmau iti virudhyete
na sambhavataḥ
ekasya dharmiṇaḥ

original: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
analyzed: tatra yat uktam nityam anitya tvasya bhāvāt nityaḥ eva
tat avartamāna artham uktam
prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kāryasamaḥ
prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti

original: yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
analyzed: yasya prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ tat khalu a bhūtvā bhavati
yathā ghaṭa ādi kāryam

original: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate/
analyzed: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavati iti etat vijñāyate

original: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate/
analyzed: evam avasthite prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate
prayatna anantaram ātmalābhaḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām
vyavadhāna apohāt ca abhivyaktiḥ vyavahitānām

original: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti/
analyzed: tat kim prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ śabdasya aho abhivyaktiḥ iti viśeṣaḥ nā asti
kārya aviśeṣeṇa pratyavasthānam
asya uttaram
kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ
sati kārya anya tve anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ prayatnasya ahetu tvam śabdasya abhivyaktau

original: yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
analyzed: yatra prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ tatra anupalabdhi kāraṇam vyavadhānam upapadyate
vyavadhāna apohāt ca prayatna anantara bhāvinaḥ arthasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇā abhivyaktiḥ bhavati iti
prayatna anantara bhāvinaḥ
na tu śabdasya anupalabdhi kāraṇam kiñcid upapadyate
yasya prayatna anantaram apohāt śabdasya upalabhi lakṣaṇā abhivyaktiḥ bhavati iti
tasmāt utpadyate śabdaḥ na abhivyajyate

original: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti/
analyzed: hetoḥ ced anaikāntika tvam upapadyate anaikātika tvāt asādhakaḥ syāt iti
yadi ca anaikāntika tvāt asādhaka tvam
pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ
pratiṣedhaḥ api anaikāntikaḥ

original: kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti/
analyzed: kiñcid pratiṣedhati kiñcid na iti anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ iti

original: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: atha vā śabdasya anitya tva pakṣe prayatna anantaram utpādaḥ na abhivyaktiḥ iti viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ

original: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ/
analyzed: nitya tva pakṣe api prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ na utpādaḥ iti viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ

original: so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti//39//
analyzed: saḥ ayam ubhaya pakṣa samaḥ viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ iti ubhayam api anaikātikam
sarvatra evam

original: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti//40//
analyzed: sarveṣu sādharmya prabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedha hetuṣu yatra yatra aviśeṣaḥ dṛśyate tatra ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata
pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe pratiṣedha doṣa vat doṣaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ/
analyzed: yaḥ ayam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ anaikāntika tvam āpadyate saḥ ayam pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe api samānaḥ
vipratiṣedhe api samānaḥ

original: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ/
analyzed: tatra anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: ``prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama'' iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ/
analyzed: prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kāryasamaḥ iti dūṣaṇa vādinaḥ pratiṣedha hetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ
sa ca pratiṣedhaḥ iti ucyate

original: tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate/
analyzed: tasya asya pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ ucyate

original: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ//41//
analyzed: tasmin pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ anaikāntika tvam caturthaḥ

original: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
analyzed: pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ matānujñā

original: pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe
analyzed: pratiṣedham dvitīyam pakṣam sa doṣam abhyupetya tad uddhāram a kṛtvā anujñāya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe

original: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino
analyzed: tṛtīya pakṣe samānam anaikāntika tvam iti samānam dūṣaṇam prasañjayataḥ dūṣaṇavādinaḥ
mata anujñā prasajyate iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: NyS_5,1.43: svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
analyzed: sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāre hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ

original: sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati/
analyzed: sthāpanā pakṣe prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti doṣaḥ sthāpanā hetuvādinaḥ sva pakṣa lakṣaṇaḥ bhavati
kasmāt sva pakṣa samuttha tvāt

original: so 'yaṃ svapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati/
analyzed: saḥ ayam sva pakṣa lakṣaṇam doṣam apekṣamāṇaḥ an uddhṛtya anujñāya pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti upapadyamānam doṣam para pakṣe upasaṃharati

original: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati/
analyzed: ittham ca anaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti hetum nirdiśati

original: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati/
analyzed: tatra sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣayā upapadyamāna doṣa upasaṃhāre hetu nirdeśe ca sati anena para pakṣa doṣaḥ abhyupagataḥ bhavati
katham kṛtvā
yaḥ pareṇa prayatna kārya aneka tvāt ityādinā anaikāntika doṣaḥ uktaḥ

original: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha/
analyzed: tam an uddhṛtya pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti āha

original: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati/
analyzed: evam sthāpanām sa doṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe api samānam doṣam prasañjayataḥ para pakṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ bhavati
prasañjayataḥ parapakṣa abhyupagamāt

original: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
analyzed: yathā parasya pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ matānujñā prasajyate iti

original: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti/
analyzed: tathā asya api sthāpanām sa doṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe api samānam doṣam prasañjayataḥ mata anujñā prasajyate iti
sa khalu ayam ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ
tatra khalu sthāpanā hetuvādinaḥ prathama tṛtīya pañcama pakṣāḥ
pratiṣedha hetuvādinaḥ dvitīya caturtha ṣaṣṭha pakṣāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭhayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ/
analyzed: teṣām sādhu asādhu tāyām mīmāṃsyamānāyām caturtha ṣaṣṭhayoḥ artha aviśeṣāt punarukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: caturthapakṣe samānadoṣatvaṃ parasyocyate --``pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe pratiṣedhadoṣavad doṣa'' iti/
analyzed: caturtha pakṣe samāna doṣa tvam parasya ucyate pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe pratiṣedha doṣa vat doṣaḥ iti

original: ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ``parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣa'' iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate,
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe api parapakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti samāna doṣa tvam eva ucyate
na artha viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti
samānaḥ tṛṭīya pañcamayoḥ punar ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate/
analyzed: tṛṭīya pakṣe api pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti samāna tvam abhyupagamyate
pañcama pakṣe api pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samānaḥ doṣa prasaṅgaḥ abhyupagamyate
na artha viśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyate iti
tatra pañcama ṣaṣṭha pakṣayoḥ artha aviśeṣāt punarukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ
tṛtīya caturthayoḥ matānujñā

original: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ/
analyzed: prathama dvitīyayoḥ viśeṣa hetu abhāvaḥ iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ
kadā ṣaṣ pakṣī

original: yadā ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' ity evaṃ pravarttate/
analyzed: yadā pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti evam pravarttate
tadā ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ asiddhiḥ

original: yadā tu ``kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter'' ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yujyate,
analyzed: yadā tu kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti anena tṛṭīya pakṣaḥ yujyate
tṛtīya pakṣaḥ yujyate
tadā viśeṣa hetu vacanāt prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ śabdasya

original: nābhivyaktir'' iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti//43//
analyzed: na abhivyaktiḥ iti siddhaḥ prathama pakṣaḥ na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata
iti śrī vātsyāyanīye nyāya bhāṣye pañcama adhyāyasya ādyam āhnikam
pañcama adhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam
vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ vikalpāt nigrahasthāna bahu tvam iti saṅkṣepeṇa uktam
tat idānīm vibhajanīyam

original: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhisaṃplavante/
analyzed: nigrahasthānāni khalu parājaya vastūni aparādha adhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñā ādi avayava āśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinam ca abhisaṃplavante
prāyeṇa ca abhisaṃplavante
teṣām vibhāgaḥ

original: NyS_5,2.1: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram
arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam
analyzed: arthāntaram nirarthakam avijñāta artham apārthakam aprāpta kālam nyūnam adhikam punaruktam

original: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo
analyzed: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ mata anujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam niranuyojyānuyogaḥ
apasiddhāntaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigrahasthānāni
tāni imāni dvāviṃśatidhā vibhajya lakṣyante

original: sādhyadharmapratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidraṣṭāntadharmaṃ svadṛṣṭānte 'bhyanujānan pratijñāṃ jahātīti pratjñāhāniḥ/
analyzed: sādhya dharma pratyanīkena dharmeṇa pratyavasthite pratidraṣṭānta dharmam sva dṛṣṭānte abhyanujānan pratijñām jahāti iti pratjñāhāniḥ

original: nidarśanam --- ``aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad'' ity kṛte apara āha -- dṛṣṭam aindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye,
analyzed: nidarśanam aindriyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat iti kṛte aparaḥ āha dṛṣṭam aindriyaka tvam sāmānye nitye
